Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Wakeforest Drive, on the east side of the campus.
Room.LongDescription: The Iilandi University is a more or less privately funded school which promotes academics in all fields of study, but mostly technology. Directly to the west, you can see the Oceancrest Technological Research Facility where mystical phenomena like earthquakes are studies and recorded. On the east side of the road are the Highland Stables, where guests of the town may leave their horses while visiting.
